title: Elon Musk Lost It on a Call With the Government After Autopilot Killed a Tesla Driver
description: In March 2018, Tesla Model X owner Walter Huang died after his vehicle crashed into a concrete highway median at 71 mph â€” while its Autopilot driver assistance software was turned on. The entire front of the vehicle was ripped off, sending the SUV spinning. Huan was pronounced dead hours after being taken to the hospital. According to details released years later, the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) confirmed that the software was turned on and that Huang had informed both his brothe
